official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to provide financial assistance for the development of alternative care facilities for elderly and handicapped persons.
short_title: Alternative Care Facilities Assistance Act of 1986
subjects: Day care centers for the aged

summary.text: Alternative Care Facilities Assistance Act of 1986 - Authorizes the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to provide financial assistance to eligible organizations for the development of nonresidential alternative care facilities for elderly and handicapped persons. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Alternative Care Facilities Assistance Act of 1986
A bill to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to provide financial assistance for the development of alternative care facilities for elderly and handicapped persons.
